subtitle: An Italian snack or appetizer of toasted bread topped with cheese, tomatoes, olives etc. Serve these snacks warm.

method.text: Put tomatoes, garlic and basil in a bowl. Add olive oil and stir well. Marinate at room temperature for 1 hour.
Stir anchovies and black olives into tomato mixture. Preheat oven to 200°C.
Cut bread into thick slices. Arrange on a baking sheet. Bake for 10 min.
Remove bread from oven and turn grill to high. Sprinkle cheese over the bread and grill for 1 min. Spoon the tomato mixture over the cheese and grill for 2 min.

title: Crostini
